creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 17897
unfied diff against trunk

- Registers the RequestReader in the sitemap
- adds a matcher for /PUT/odt
- started refactoring Put.java, validation not working ATM

With this patch and 17896, one should be able to perform the usecases:

a)
open cadaver
set editor vi
edit document.xml
save the file in vi

b)
open with cadaver
set editor ooffice2
edit document.odt with openoffice
save the file in openoffice
creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com
